entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Joliette
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
